error.message: Missing explicit access check on entity query.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\FunctionalTests\AssertLegacyTrait in class Drupal\Tests\workbench_moderation\Functional\ModerationStateTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.2.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use the methods from \Drupal\Tests\WebAssert instead.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
